metro.WindowControls

Class Label

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.WindowControls.ActionObservable
      • metro.WindowControls.Label
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlElement

    public class Label
extends ActionObservable
implements ControlElement
    Create a label to hold text with optional automatic line breaks.
    Author:
    hauke

        public Label(java.lang.String text,
     java.awt.Point position,
     int areaWidth,
     Window window)
        Creates a new label.
        Parameters:
        text - The text that should be displayed.
        position - The position on the screen/window (absolute)
        areaWidth - Maximum width of label for automatic line breaks.
        window - The window it's on.

      • Label

        public Label(java.lang.String text,
     java.awt.Point position,
     int areaWidth)
        Creates a new label.
        Parameters:
        text - The text that should be displayed.
        position - The position on the screen/window (absolute)
        areaWidth - The maximum width of the label. This will enable automatic line breaks.
